item.description:
Let's get together at a new venue...how does Bar sound to you? A little pizza, pool and great brewed beer??!!

Its almost 2008...are you ready for the best year of your life? Together we can celebrate the end of 2007 and the possibilities of 2008!

See you there!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: 40's...Let's Get Together and have Fun! June Meeting
